Worpdress Publishing anD Dropbox Support comes to Ulysses on iOS

Two and a half years ago, I took the plunge. I did what we were told not to do. I did what everybody who’s been in this business for more than two weeks knows not to do. I did it anyway.

It took ‘em a while, but Ulysses for iOS just got a whole lot better with Dropbox support and Wordpress Publishing with the latest update.
